channel.title: [SINGLEPLAYER] Walk not working
channel.description:
The ability to bind walk has been added to the official Steam version of Black Mesa; the original mod didn't allow that option.
[b]However, walking doesn't seem to work.[/b] No matter which key it's bound to, it simply has no affect on my speed (I've tested both pressing it as a toggle, and holding it down like as it works in most other Source engine games).
I tested this for singleplayer.

item.title: [SINGLEPLAYER] Walk not working
item.dc:creator: Shask
item.description:
The ability to bind walk has been added to the official Steam version of Black Mesa; the original mod didn’t allow that option.

However, walking doesn’t seem to work. No matter which key it’s bound to, it simply has no affect on my speed (I’ve tested both pressing it as a toggle, and holding it down like as it works in most other Source engine games).

I tested this for singleplayer.

Read full topic
